thread.title: Fernando Hu
thread.title_full: Autoclick Rent a Car evaluado por Fernando Hu

author: Fernando Hu
title: Fernando Hu
text: On this 28th of February, I came to the company to take the car I rent in the website of zuzuche. But the company failed to find my information in their system. I was very anxious and didn't know what I should do. Mr. Bruno is very patient and help me to deal with the problems. He talked with the worker of the zuzuche, discussed the solution for me and signed on the order according to the requirement of zuzuche. My mobile phone was out of power, then he charged it for me. Through his hard work, I got a car in the shop. He is very nice and helpful. The autoclick is very great too. Obrigado.
